entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Sechelt

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain mixed with wet snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Fog patches dissipating late this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 07:49 AM PST Wednesday 01 February 2023
